subject: Re: Heath  PandaDoc
preview: Don't leave me hanging! Here to help!    Are you available for a brief call on Friday or Monday to go over what you are hoping to achieve with PandaDoc?  Or, to schedule a meeting immediately, please

full_threads.body:
Don't leave me hanging! Here to help!



Are you available for a brief call on Friday or Monday to go over what you are hoping to achieve with PandaDoc?

Or, to schedule a meeting immediately, please click the link in my email signature to select a day and time that works for you.



Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111

Hi Heath,

To help me avoid sending you unnecessary emails, please let me know either:

a. Wait, let's schedule a call this week, we are still interested in moving forward with PandaDoc this month

b. Close it out, we will not be moving forward anytime soon.



Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111

Hi Heath,

To help me avoid sending you unnecessary emails, please let me know either:

a. Wait, let's schedule a call this week, we are still interested in moving forward with PandaDoc this month

b. Close it out, we will not be moving forward anytime soon.



Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111

Hi Heath,

I haven't heard back from you and am curious how your trial went. Are you still interested in evaluating PandaDoc?

If you are, can we set up a quick call sometime this or next week to discuss?

If not, please let me know and I will update your account information.



Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111

Hey Heath,

Following up here in case this got buried in your inbox. Did you intend to launch the PandaDoc trial at all?



Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111

Hi Heath,

Would a refresher of PandaDoc be helpful?

You signed up for our free 14-day trial recently. Let me know if that doesn't fit your intended timeline and we can talk about extending your trial accordingly.

Are you available for a brief call on Tuesday or Wednesday to go over what you are hoping to achieve with PandaDoc?

Or, to schedule a meeting immediately, please click the link in my email signature to select a day and time that works for you.



Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111

Hi Heath,

Dovud from PandaDoc here.

I'm reaching out because you signed up for a trial of our platform in the not so distant past. I'd love to learn about your interest in PandaDoc and help you understand PandaDoc's potential impact on your business.

Are you available for a brief call on Thursday or Friday?

Or, to schedule a meeting immediately, please click the link in my email signature to select a day and time that works for you.

Dovud Mirzoolimov, Account Executive

(650) 284.3045 | www.PandaDoc.com

101 California St, STE 3975, San Francisco, CA 94111




Would you like to opt out?
